system.rearArmour: Ork Pilot, Ork Co-Pilot, Grot Gunners.
system.crew: Gunners: 4x Bigga Big Shoota Turrets(All, Range 400m (4 AU's), S/3/10, 2d10+10 I, Pen 5, Clip 1000, Reload -, Inaccurate, Unreliable, Twin-Linked.
system.passengers: Is a Spacecraft, can act as Flyer or Skimmer in Atmosphere, following relevent rules and work in and out of atmosphere. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve the result, rounding up. Can affix to Spacecraft ship hull as +0 Pilot(Space Craft) Test and spend 4 Full Rounds to burn through. Has Craft Rating of +8 for Attack Craft Purposes, squadron size 15. Can only acquire if allied with Ork Freebooters.
